data.name: World Flight
data.description:
Fly around the world without limits with your Meta Quest 2 headset.

Feel the freedom, travel anywhere in the planet and enjoy all its beauty and diversity.

[Internet connection required]

Features:
- Plan your flight on the map with a powerful search engine
- Fly a plane or a helicopter with totally different gameplays
- Dynamic weather, wind and time of day 
- Procedurally generated buildings and water with real data
- Enjoy some of the most famous landmarks
- Fully interactive cockpits
- Manage fuel, wind, flaps, landing gear and brakes
- Take off and land at any airport/heliport in the world

translations.long_description:
Vuela alrededor del mundo sin límites con tu casco Meta Quest 2.

Siente la libertad, viaja a cualquier parte del planeta y disfruta de toda su belleza y diversidad.

Características:
- Planifica tu vuelo en el mapa con un potente motor de búsqueda
- Vuela un avión o un helicóptero con modos de juego totalmente diferentes
- Tiempo dinámico, viento y hora del día.
- Edificios y agua generados procesalmente con datos reales
- Disfruta de algunos de los lugares más famosos.
- Cabinas completamente interactivas
- Administrar combustible, viento, flaps, tren de aterrizaje y frenos
- Despegar y aterrizar en cualquier aeropuerto/helipuerto del mundo

changelog.change_log:
v1.2.3:
- Added a new plane mission
- Show descriptions of places in missions
- Fix leaderboard scrolling
- Fix landmarks 3D models not showing
- Set fixed wind direction in missions

v1.2.2:
- First missions added to test the feature
- Add sound FX volume setting
- Improve performances in big cities
- Some changes in fog and sky colors
- Add changelog in Main Menu clicking on game version
- Some other bug fixes (Refuel in airports... etc)

v1.2.0:
- First missions added to test the feature
- Add sound FX volume setting
- Improve performances in big cities
- Some changes in fog and sky colors
- Add changelog in Main Menu clicking on game version
- Some other bug fixes (Refuel in airports... etc)

v1.1.2: 
- Reduce the size of the airplane cockpit

v1.1.1:
- Use real location time and weather
- Get map waypoints address (if available) in Main Menu

v1.1.0:
- Improved radar map
- Dark mode on main menu map

v1.0.10:
- Fix endless loading issue with unstable connections
- Add VR settings for collective lever
- Reduce airplane fuel consumption
- Match autopilot speed to current speed
- Better fx when flying through clouds

v1.0.9:
- Add autopilot in airplane
- Fix cockpit interaction with index finger

v1.0.8:
- Smoother joystick control
- Add Volumetric lighting FX in Photo Mode
- Reduce stall limit

v1.0.7:
- Add requested VR comfort settings

v1.0.6:
- Fix server error during first launch
- Fix planes crash at airports with near-zero altitude
- Reduce airplane control stick movement

v1.0.5:
- Improve main menu map
- Fix keyboard click events
- Better Sepia filter in Photo Mode

v1.0.4:
- Add Time Of Day slider in Photo Mode
- Add some new achievements
- Add some new landmarks
- Center main menu map on player location

v1.0.3: 
- Flatten terrain in airports 
- Add different radar types 
- Add day of the month selector 
- Add a lot more landmarks
